title: * RC is the rate of construction in respect of R
clause_text: * RC is the rate of construction in respect of R.C.C. Construction, as published by the Chief Controlling Revenue Authority & Inspector General of Registration, Maharashtra State in the Annual Schedule of Rates.
section: 33(5)Development/Redevelopment of Housing Schemes of Maharashtra Housing & Area Development Authority (MHADA)
